publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3528.4 Liam McArthur: Marine Bill Consultationâ€”As an amendment to motion (S3M-3528) in the name of Richard Lochhead, insert at end "and calls on the Scottish Government to publish its conclusions on the consultation and bring forward a dedicated Scottish Marine Bill as soon as possible to ensure that Scotland does not fall behind the rest of the United Kingdom in the sustainable management of its seas and coast."
